course_title: Mastering Dog Walking Business with Dog Dollars
description: Learn how to efficiently manage and grow your dog walking business using the Dog Dollars platform, covering bookings, schedules, client management, payments, and more.

modules.title: Introduction to Dog Walking Business Management

lessons.title: Getting Started with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Overview of the Dog Dollars platform, its features, and how to sign up for a free trial.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Business Profile
lessons.description: How to create and customize your business profile, including adding staff seats, clients, and pets.

lessons.title: Smart Scheduling with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Using schedule blocks, recurring bookings, and the drag-and-drop calendar to manage your bookings efficiently.

lessons.title: Managing Client Information and Preferences
lessons.description: How to keep track of client details, including their pets, preferences, and booking history.

lessons.title: Invoicing and Online Payments
lessons.description: How to generate invoices automatically and receive online payments through Dog Dollars.

lessons.title: Creating and Sending Report Cards
lessons.description: Using Dog Dollars to send beautiful report cards with photos, potty reports, and notes after every walk.

lessons.title: GPS Tracking and Photo Updates
lessons.description: How to use GPS tracking to show clients where their pets went on their adventure and sharing photos during walks.

lessons.title: Business Analytics and Performance Tracking
lessons.description: Using Dog Dollars analytics to track revenue, walker performance, and client retention.

modules.title: Growing Your Business with Dog Dollars

lessons.title: Marketing Strategies for Dog Walking Businesses
lessons.description: Tips and strategies for marketing your dog walking business and attracting new clients.

lessons.title: Scaling Your Business with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: How to use Dog Dollars to manage growth, including adding staff seats, custom domains, and advanced analytics.
